mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (REV_NO, REV_CONTENT, STAR_SCORE, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, USER_NO, PLACE_NO) VALUES (SEQ_REV_NO.NEXTVAL, #{revContent}, #{starScore}, 'Y', SYSDATE, #{userNo}, #{placeNo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REVIEW WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY REV_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW_PICTURE (IMG_NO, REV_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME) VALUES (SEQ_IMG_NO.NEXTVAL, #{revNo}, #{originName}, #{changeName})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, REV_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STAR_SCORE, REV_NO, R.USER_NO FROM MEMBER M, REVIEW R WHERE M.USER_NO = R.USER_NO AND PLACE_NO = #{placeNo} ORDER BY REV_NO DESC

SELECT USER_ID, REV_CONTENT, R.CREATE_DATE, STAR_SCORE, REV_NO, R.USER_NO, P.PLACE_NAME FROM MEMBER M, REVIEW R, PLACE P WHERE M.USER_NO = R.USER_NO AND P.PLACE_NO = R.PLACE_NO AND R.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY REV_NO DESC
SELECT R.REV_NO, CHANGE_NAME FROM REVIEW R, REVIEW_PICTURE RP WHERE R.REV_NO = RP.REV_NO AND PLACE_NO = #{placeNo} ORDER BY R.REV_NO DESC
SELECT R.REV_NO, CHANGE_NAME FROM REVIEW R, REVIEW_PICTURE RP WHERE R.REV_NO = RP.REV_NO AND R.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY R.REV_NO DESC
